attributes.action: HELP TO STOP the Hoo New Routes to Good Growth - Higham Road Phase 1
attributes.additional_details: We echo Kelly Tolhurst comments (Member of Parliment) "it is important that we continue to come together as a community to fight proposals that will only damage the fabric and environment of our area and strain our local infrastructure and services" These plans are increasing stress and mental health for all residents. COVID is still present these works must be stopped. Safety and the wellbeing of local residents must be priority, these plans are not safe for any residents or pedestrians!
attributes.background:
We want Medway Council to stop the works at Higham Road -INCREASED traffic for the residential road, INCREASED Pollution, INCREASED noise, LARGE scale works, DANGER to the elderly and the young. All residents who use the road to access the open fields and enjoy the surrounds 
HELP STOP THESE WORKS!

rejection.details:
You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
